subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Alfonso Soriano hit a game-ending two-run single to give the host Chicago Cubs a 10-9 victory against the Colorado Rockies last night after the Cubs’ bullpen blew an 8-3 lead in the ninth inning.
snippet: Alfonso Soriano hit a game-ending two-run single to give the host Chicago Cubs a 10-9 victory against the Colorado Rockies last night after the Cubs’ bullpen blew an 8-3 lead in the ninth inning.
